attributes.action: Force local authorities to offer unused shop space to small businesses for a large discount
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are thousands of unused shop spaces across the UK due to our recent financial crisis.
Please force local authorities to reduce the rent on these properties for small businesses to encourage small businesses to prosper and therefore increase the value of our national economy.
The discount should last one year to give businesses a running start and be at least a 50% reduction.
Businesses that have more than 2 shops should be omitted from this scheme, because the point is to encourage new and small business.
